name: Babylon Glossary File
summary: Learn about .BGL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
Microsoft Flight Simulator X Steam Edition

content: BGL files can be generated using the Babylon Glossary Builder, which can be used to create custom glossaries.
NOTE: Babylon and Babylon Glossary Builder have been discontinued.

description: Glossary file used by Babylon, a program that supports online translation in many different languages; contains terms and definitions that can be loaded into Babylon; can be translated on-the-fly into different languages by the Babylon application.
